verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt love the LORD thy God, and keep his charge, and his statutes, and his judgments, and his commandments, alway.
verses.web: Therefore you shall love LORD your God, and keep his instructions, his statutes, his ordinances, and his commandments, always.
verses.ct: So love the LORD your God, and always obey his requirements — his laws, his regulations, and his commandments.

verses.kjv: And know ye this day: for I speak not with your children which have not known, and which have not seen the chastisement of the LORD your God, his greatness, his mighty hand, and his stretched out arm,
verses.web: Know this day—for I don’t speak with your children who have not known, and who have not seen the chastisement of LORD your God, his greatness, his mighty hand, his outstretched arm,
verses.ct: Understand something today: I'm not speaking to your children, who weren't there and didn't witness the discipline of the LORD your God firsthand — his greatness, his mighty hand, his outstretched arm,

verses.kjv: And his miracles, and his acts, which he did in the midst of Egypt unto Pharaoh the king of Egypt, and unto all his land;
verses.web: his signs, and his works, which he did in the middle of Egypt to Pharaoh the king of Egypt, and to all his land;
verses.ct: his miracles and his powerful acts that he performed right in the heart of Egypt against Pharaoh, king of Egypt, and against his entire land;

verses.kjv: And what he did unto the army of Egypt, unto their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the water of the Red sea to overflow them as they pursued after you, and how the LORD hath destroyed them unto this day;
verses.web: and what he did to the army of Egypt, to their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the water of the Red Sea to overflow them as they pursued you, and how LORD has destroyed them to this day;
verses.ct: what he did to the Egyptian army, their horses, and their chariots — how he sent the waters of the Red Sea crashing over them as they chased you, and how the LORD destroyed them completely, and they remain destroyed to this day;

verses.kjv: And what he did unto you in the wilderness, until ye came into this place;
verses.web: and what he did to you in the wilderness until you came to this place;
verses.ct: what he did for you in the wilderness all the way until you arrived at this place;

verses.kjv: And what he did unto Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, the son of Reuben: how the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their households, and their tents, and all the substance that was in their possession, in the midst of all Israel:
verses.web: and what he did to Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, the son of Reuben—how the earth opened its mouth and swallowed them up, with their households, their tents, and every living thing that followed them, in the middle of all Israel;
verses.ct: and what he did to Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab from the tribe of Reuben — how the ground split open and swallowed them alive, along with their families, their tents, and every living thing they owned, right there in front of all Israel.

verses.kjv: But your eyes have seen all the great acts of the LORD which he did.
verses.web: but your eyes have seen all of LORD’s great work which he did.
verses.ct: You saw all of this with your own eyes — every great thing the LORD has done.

verses.kjv: Therefore shall ye keep all the commandments which I command you this day, that ye may be strong, and go in and possess the land, whither ye go to possess it;
verses.web: Therefore you shall keep the entire commandment which I command you today, that you may be strong, and go in and possess the land that you go over to possess;
verses.ct: So obey every commandment I'm giving you today. This will make you strong enough to cross over and take possession of the land you're about to enter,

verses.kjv: And that ye may prolong your days in the land, which the LORD sware unto your fathers to give unto them and to their seed, a land that floweth with milk and honey.
verses.web: and that you may prolong your days in the land which LORD swore to your fathers to give to them and to their offspring, a land flowing with milk and honey.
verses.ct: and it will give you long lives in the land the LORD promised to your ancestors and their descendants — a land flowing with milk and honey.

verses.kjv: For the land, whither thou goest in to possess it, is not as the land of Egypt, from whence ye came out, where thou sowedst thy seed, and wateredst it with thy foot, as a garden of herbs:
verses.web: For the land, where you go in to possess isn’t like the land of Egypt that you came out of, where you sowed your seed and watered it with your foot, as a garden of herbs;
verses.ct: The land you're about to enter and possess is nothing like Egypt, where you came from. In Egypt, you planted your seeds and irrigated them by foot, like watering a vegetable garden.

verses.kjv: But the land, whither ye go to possess it, is a land of hills and valleys, and drinketh water of the rain of heaven:
verses.web: but the land that you go over to possess is a land of hills and valleys which drinks water from the rain of the sky,
verses.ct: But the land you're crossing over to possess is a land of hills and valleys that drinks its water from the rain of heaven.

verses.kjv: A land which the LORD thy God careth for: the eyes of the LORD thy God are always upon it, from the beginning of the year even unto the end of the year.
verses.web: a land which LORD your God cares for. LORD your God’s eyes are always on it, from the beginning of the year even to the end of the year.
verses.ct: It's a land the LORD your God personally cares for. His eyes are on it constantly, from the first day of the year to the last.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken diligently unto my commandments which I command you this day, to love the LORD your God, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul,
verses.web: It shall happen, if you shall listen diligently to my commandments which I command you today, to love LORD your God, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul,
verses.ct: If you carefully obey the commandments I'm giving you today — to love the LORD your God and serve him with all your heart and all your soul —

verses.kjv: That I will give you the rain of your land in his due season, the first rain and the latter rain, that thou mayest gather in thy corn, and thy wine, and thine oil.
verses.web: that I will give the rain for your land in its season, the early rain and the latter rain, that you may gather in your grain, your new wine, and your oil.
verses.ct: then I will send rain on your land at just the right time, both the early rains and the late rains, so you can harvest your grain, your wine, and your olive oil.

verses.kjv: And I will send grass in thy fields for thy cattle, that thou mayest eat and be full.
verses.web: I will give grass in your fields for your livestock, and you shall eat and be full.
verses.ct: I will grow grass in your fields for your livestock, and you will eat until you're satisfied.

verses.kjv: Take heed to yourselves, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and serve other gods, and worship them;
verses.web: Be careful, lest your heart be deceived, and you turn away to serve other gods and worship them;
verses.ct: But be careful! Don't let your hearts be deceived. Don't turn away to serve other gods and worship them,

verses.kjv: And then the LORD’s wrath be kindled against you, and he shut up the heaven, that there be no rain, and that the land yield not her fruit; and lest ye perish quickly from off the good land which the LORD giveth you.
verses.web: and LORD’s anger be kindled against you, and he shut up the sky so that there is no rain, and the land doesn’t yield its fruit; and you perish quickly from off the good land which LORD gives you.
verses.ct: or the LORD's anger will burn against you. He will shut the heavens so no rain falls, and the ground won't produce its crops. Then you'll quickly disappear from the good land the LORD is giving you.

verses.kjv: Therefore shall ye lay up these my words in your heart and in your soul, and bind them for a sign upon your hand, that they may be as frontlets between your eyes.
verses.web: Therefore you shall lay up these words of mine in your heart and in your soul. You shall bind them for a sign on your hand, and they shall be for frontlets between your eyes.
verses.ct: So fix these words of mine deep in your heart and soul. Tie them as a sign on your hand, and wear them as reminders on your forehead.

verses.kjv: And ye shall teach them your children, speaking of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
verses.web: You shall teach them to your children, talking of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, when you lie down, and when you rise up.
verses.ct: Teach them to your children. Talk about them when you're sitting at home and when you're walking down the road, when you lie down at night and when you get up in the morning.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt write them upon the door posts of thine house, and upon thy gates:
verses.web: You shall write them on the door posts of your house and on your gates;
verses.ct: Write them on the doorframes of your house and on your gates.

verses.kjv: That your days may be multiplied, and the days of your children, in the land which the LORD sware unto your fathers to give them, as the days of heaven upon the earth.
verses.web: that your days and your children’s days may be multiplied in the land which LORD swore to your fathers to give them, as the days of the heavens above the earth.
verses.ct: Then you and your children will live long in the land the LORD promised to your ancestors — as long as the heavens remain above the earth.

verses.kjv: For if ye shall diligently keep all these commandments which I command you, to do them, to love the LORD your God, to walk in all his ways, and to cleave unto him;
verses.web: For if you shall diligently keep all these commandments which I command you—to do them, to love LORD your God, to walk in all his ways, and to cling to him—
verses.ct: If you carefully follow every commandment I'm giving you — doing what they say, loving the LORD your God, walking in all his ways, and holding tightly to him —

verses.kjv: Then will the LORD drive out all these nations from before you, and ye shall possess greater nations and mightier than yourselves.
verses.web: then LORD will drive out all these nations from before you, and you shall dispossess nations greater and mightier than yourselves.
verses.ct: then the LORD will drive out all these nations ahead of you, and you will take over nations that are bigger and more powerful than you are.

verses.kjv: Every place whereon the soles of your feet shall tread shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea shall your coast be.
verses.web: Every place on which the sole of your foot treads shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even to the western sea shall be your border.
verses.ct: Every place your foot touches will be yours. Your territory will stretch from the wilderness to Lebanon, and from the Euphrates River all the way to the western sea.

verses.kjv: There shall no man be able to stand before you: for the LORD your God shall lay the fear of you and the dread of you upon all the land that ye shall tread upon, as he hath said unto you.
verses.web: No man will be able to stand before you. LORD your God will lay the fear of you and the dread of you on all the land that you tread on, as he has spoken to you.
verses.ct: No one will be able to stand against you. The LORD your God will spread the fear and dread of you across every land where you set foot, just as he promised you.

verses.kjv: Behold, I set before you this day a blessing and a curse;
verses.web: Behold, I set before you today a blessing and a curse:
verses.ct: Look — today I'm placing before you a blessing and a curse:

verses.kjv: A blessing, if ye obey the commandments of the LORD your God, which I command you this day:
verses.web: the blessing, if you listen to the commandments of LORD your God, which I command you today;
verses.ct: the blessing, if you obey the commandments of the LORD your God that I'm giving you today;

verses.kjv: And a curse, if ye will not obey the commandments of the LORD your God, but turn aside out of the way which I command you this day, to go after other gods, which ye have not known.
verses.web: and the curse, if you do not listen to the commandments of LORD your God, but turn away out of the way which I command you today, to go after other gods which you have not known.
verses.ct: and the curse, if you disobey the commandments of the LORD your God and turn away from the path I'm laying out for you today by chasing after other gods you've never known.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, when the LORD thy God hath brought thee in unto the land whither thou goest to possess it, that thou shalt put the blessing upon mount Gerizim, and the curse upon mount Ebal.
verses.web: It shall happen, when LORD your God brings you into the land that you go to possess, that you shall set the blessing on Mount Gerizim, and the curse on Mount Ebal.
verses.ct: When the LORD your God brings you into the land you're going to possess, you must proclaim the blessing from Mount Gerizim and the curse from Mount Ebal.

verses.kjv: Are they not on the other side Jordan, by the way where the sun goeth down, in the land of the Canaanites, which dwell in the champaign over against Gilgal, beside the plains of Moreh?
verses.web: Aren’t they beyond the Jordan, behind the way of the going down of the sun, in the land of the Canaanites who dwell in the Arabah near Gilgal, beside the oaks of Moreh?
verses.ct: These mountains are across the Jordan, west of the road toward the setting sun, in the territory of the Canaanites who live in the Arabah near Gilgal, beside the oaks of Moreh.

verses.kjv: For ye shall pass over Jordan to go in to possess the land which the LORD your God giveth you, and ye shall possess it, and dwell therein.
verses.web: For you are to pass over the Jordan to go in to possess the land which LORD your God gives you, and you shall possess it and dwell in it.
verses.ct: You are about to cross the Jordan and take possession of the land the LORD your God is giving you. You will claim it and settle there.

verses.kjv: And ye shall observe to do all the statutes and judgments which I set before you this day.
verses.web: You shall observe to do all the statutes and the ordinances which I set before you today.
verses.ct: Make sure you follow every law and regulation I'm placing before you today.
